php.title: Compressor Sizing program
php.description: The program is used as the company's internal tool to determine which compressor is best recommended based on input and data from user against a database.

php.title: PCB Quoting Online
php.description: Enable users to register, create PCB sizing entries, load, edit and delete. In the end the user can get a realtime quote. They can also submit their saved quote directly to the company.

php.title: Pump Sizing Program
php.description: The company needs a program to automate the creation of recommended upgrades on their Pump Systems. This program does not only that, but email the recommended upgrades and reports in HTML email with pdf attachments.

php.title: Pump Systems Builder
php.description: The company needs a program available for their distributor to generate quotes and pump system specs online. It can also save, edit, delete and submit the pump system online.

website.title: Dr. Scott Bartlett
description: Lyquix project: Dr. Scott Bartlett MD requires a website to list all of his surgery procedures. The procedures can also be filtered according to body types.
The website is powered by wordpress, to enable the client to edit and add any content they want.

website.title: Lyquix
description: Lyquix project: Obviously internal project to showcase what the company can do.
There is a list of our portfolio, along with every market we represents.
We also includes blog, which is updated regularly, full of information that we believe is interesting news in the world of website development and design methods.
The website is powered by Joomla and Flexicontent.

website.title: Salveo Weight Management
description: Lyquix project: Salveo Weight Management is a weight loss solution that makes sense. It doesn't have gimmicks, only proven methods.
The website explains the service provided by the company, and easy to understand information about what works in terms of weight loss.
Powered by Wordpress, this website is finished in 2016

website.title: Rothman Institute
description: Lyquix project: Rothman Institute speaks for itself as an internationally recognized for excellence in orthopaedic science and technology.

The website is massive, and has intricate functionalities. We build it so that the information on Rothman Institute's services, physicans, locations, events, news and many more information is laid out in a logical way.
When we launched it, I really feel that this website is one of my best accomplishment in web developmment

website.title: I Miller Microscopes, Leica Products Section
